Posts.Content: Aug 3, 2009 11:30AM teethman8318 wrote: You should check out in getting a mouth guard. I am in no way suggesting that this will be an absolute cure for if you suffer from "TMJ" (Still see a doctor), but this will be a short-term solution to alleviating your jaw pain and protecting your teeth from grinding/clenching any further. Check out www.totalgard.com for affordable night guards .. good luck!
